text: @realDonaldTrump What you should worry more about is why did you say a woman died of the Coronavirus when it was a MAN! I'm not too confident that you or Pence know what the Hell you're doing. Now, that someone has died I think this proves this isn't a hoax or a DNC hoax. It's a virus! #JACKASS!

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
